title: Pipeline
text: Pipeline = deals where stage NOT IN ('Closed Won','Closed Lost') (do NOT filter stage = 'Pipeline').

title: Closed Won
text: Closed Won revenue = SUM(revenue) where stage = 'Closed Won'.

title: Closed Lost
text: Closed Lost revenue = SUM(revenue) where stage = 'Closed Lost'.

title: Deal Count
text: Deal count = COUNT(*) across deals (respect filters).

title: Win Rate
text: Win rate = Closed Won count / (Closed Won + Closed Lost).

title: In Finalisation
text: In Finalisation = SUM(revenue) where stage = 'In Finalisation'.
